name: DARK SOULSâ„¢ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes: The grass and other types of foliage seem to only appear when you are standing in them but everything else renders right.
content:
game:
  appid: 335300
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    key: StrictDrawOrdering
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    type: REG_SZ
    value: enabled
winesteam:
  version: staging-3.8-x86_64
